dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT WN.TO_USER , papf.full_name , PAPF.EMPLOYEE_NUMBER, WN.SUBJECT, TO_CHAR(PPFS.ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY') ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE, TO_CHAR(ppfs.final_process_date,'MM/DD/YYYY')FINAL_PROCESS_DATE, MAX(WN.NOTIFICATION_ID) NOTIFICATION_ID, WN.MESSAGE_TYPE , WN.MESSAGE_NAME, WN.RECIPIENT_ROLE, WN.CONTEXT , WN.ITEM_KEY , NVL(TO_CHAR(SENT_DATE ,'MM/DD/YYYY'), NULL)SENT_DATE, WN.STATUS FROM WF_NOTIFICATIONS WN, WF_ITEM_ACTIVITY_STATUSES WIAS , WF_ITEM_ATTRIBUTE_VALUES WIAV , PER_ALL_PEOPLE_F PAPF, per_periods_of_service ppfs, ap_credit_card_trxns_all accta, AP_CARDS_ALL ACA WHERE wn.item_key =wias.item_key AND wias.item_key =wiav.item_key AND wias.item_type =wiav.item_type AND papf.employee_number =wiav.text_value AND papf.person_id =aca.employee_id AND accta.card_id =aca.card_id AND accta.card_program_id=aca.card_program_id AND papf.person_id =ppfs.person_id AND WN.MESSAGE_TYPE ='APCCARD' AND WIAS.ACTIVITY_STATUS ='ACTIVE' AND WIAV.NAME ='INACT_EMP_NAME' AND TRUNC (SYSDATE) BETWEEN PAPF.EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND PAPF.EFFECTIVE_END_DATE AND WN.MESSAGE_NAME = 'OIE_MSG_MGR_INACTIVE_EMPL_EX_1' AND WN.STATUS NOT IN ('CANCELED','CLOSED') GROUP BY WN.TO_USER , papf.full_name , PAPF.EMPLOYEE_NUMBER, WN.SUBJECT, ppfs.ACTUAL_TERMINATION_DATE, ppfs.FINAL_PROCESS_DATE, WN.NOTIFICATION_ID, WN.MESSAGE_TYPE , WN.MESSAGE_NAME, WN.RECIPIENT_ROLE, WN.CONTEXT , WN.ITEM_KEY , SENT_DATE, WN.STATUS
